div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 745 Adrianople, c. 1855 (?) (16) Burial: c. 330-320 B.C. (T) Contents: "several hundred" AR. Pot hoard Thracian Chersonese: "several hundred" hemidr. Parium: "several hundred" hemidr. Disposition: von Prokesch-Osten 32 Chers. von Prokesch-Osten, Inedita (Vienna, 1859), pp. 303-4
